headline: Verizon Communications Inc. (VZ) Expands 5G Ultra Wideband and AI Wearable Partnerships with Meta
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 12 Most Undervalued Dow Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. Verizon Communications Inc. is one of them. Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ), one of the U.S.’s largest telecommunications providers, is strengthening its market position with solid financial results, dividend growth, and new technology partnerships.
